alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 18 at 3:41AM EDT until May 18 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Fairfield, Northern New Haven, Northern New London and Southern New London Counties. In New Jersey, Western Passaic County. In New York, Putnam, Rockland, Northern Westchester, Northeast Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern New London
